title: Stream: Jamie Isaac – I Will Be Cold Soon EP
content:
Two years in the making, Jamie Isaac’s debut EP, I Will Be Cold Soon, is finally available.

Featuring the Pitchfork rated Softly Draining Seas (first featured on CitR back in September 2011, not that I’m bragging…), alongside re-recorded versions of Can See and Hardened Front, as well as new track I Will Be Cold Soon, it’s a boldly atmospheric affair, and just the first whispers of a talent that’s sure to be around for many years to come. Purchase the EP here, and stream it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
